mapper.select: select pno, pname, pamount, pcontent, psubtitle, pdifficulty, pprice, pweight, ptime, pmainimg, psubimg1, psubimg2, pmainimgtype, psubimg1type, psubimg2type from products
mapper.insert: insert into products (pno, pname, pamount, pcontent, psubtitle, pdifficulty, pprice, pweight, ptime, pmainimg, psubimg1, psubimg2, pmainimgtype, psubimg1type, psubimg2type) values (pno_seq.nextval, #{pname}, #{pamount}, #{pcontent}, #{psubtitle}, #{pdifficulty}, #{pprice}, #{pweight}, #{ptime}, #{pmainimg}, #{psubimg1}, #{psubimg2}, #{pmainimgtype}, #{psubimg1type}, #{psubimg2type})
